title: Mini-Ep 176: Aldi and All Night
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 176: Aldi and All Night
itunes:subtitle: Kate tries out some Sally Hansen nail products, and Doree has some thoughts about aging. Then, “Aldi Nerds” weigh in with passionate recommendations about their favorite grocery store. Plus, an Australian listener calls in about NuFace, and an expectan...
description:
Kate tries out some Sally Hansen nail products, and Doree has some thoughts about aging. Then, “Aldi Nerds” weigh in with passionate recommendations about their favorite grocery store. Plus, an Australian listener calls in about NuFace, and an expectant listener shares her fears of childbirth.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
